title: Apple’s brand-new 13-inch iPad Air is $50 off for the first time
content:
Macworld

Back in May Apple released its first-ever 13-inch iPad Air and if you’ve wanted one, now is the time to act because the Apple iPad Air 13-inch M2 is available for $749, down from $799, the lowest we’ve ever seen.

The iPad Air 13-inch is a fantastic tablet for fun, work, or anything in between. The Liquid Retina display is downright stunning with fantastic color and contrast, so it’s perfect for drawing or just kicking back and watching a movie. Under the hood, the iPad Air has an M2 chip, which can handle everything from Final Cut Pro to Netflix to your favorite games. And of course, it has a fantastic battery life, so you’ll be able to use it for long hours without issues.

While we didn’t review this exact model, we did test the 11-inch model, which we enjoyed quite a bit, giving it 4 out of 5 stars. “The lower entry-level price, the increased basic memory capacity of 128GB, and the front camera on the long edge are all pleasing upgrades for this generation of Air,” our expert noted.

If you want to make the iPad Air an even better tool for your daily work, you can add Apple’s new Apple Pencil Pro and Magic Keyboard, which are also on sale for $10 off. And if you want something more powerful, the 11-inch iPad Pro is also on sale for $50 off. But for the price, the 13-inch M2 iPad Air for $749 is really hard to beat, so go grab one before the price jumps back up.
